metadata.title: CVE-2019-6461 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in cairo 1.16.0. There is an assertion problem in the function _cairo_arc_in_direction in the file cairo-arc.c.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-11-26, no upstream fix

criterions.comment: cairo package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
